Text:
Darksiders The Abomination Vault 

Ari Marmell (Author) 


This Darksiders novel was released on July 24th, 2012. It takes place before the events of Darksiders and Darksiders II, and follows the two Horsemen War and Death on a quest to protect the Abomination Vault. 

Info: 

File size: 2.03mb 
Format: epub 
Lenguage: English 


Enjoy and seed!
